    • paintBlack

      public void paintBlack()

    • paint

      public void paint(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack i)
      Paints the base inventory with an itemstack. This change affects all current and future inventoryviews derived from this one.
      Parameters:
      i - Itemstack to paint with.

    • rename

      public void rename(String name)

    • updateSingleItem

      public void updateSingleItem(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity e, int slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, boolean persistent)
      Embeds a single item, with no defined action, into a GUI viewer's view. If the slot being embedded into previously contained a GuiComponent, that component will be erased.

      If persistent, the host inventory will be modified along with the target's view, thus affecting all new GUIs derived from this one.

      Parameters:
      e - The target GUI viewer.
      slot - The slot to embed an item into.
      item - The item to be embedded.
      persistent - Whether or not to modify the host inventory.

    • updateSingleComponent

      public void updateSingleComponent(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity e, int slot, GuiComponent component)
      Embeds a GuiComponent with a defined action into a GUI viewer's view.
      Parameters:
      e - The target GUI viewer.
      slot - The slot in which to embed a component into.
      component - The component to be embedded.

    • updateAllItem

      public void updateAllItem(int slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, boolean persistent)
      Embeds a single item, with no defined action, into all currently opened surface2 GUIs of this type. If the slot being embedded into previously contained a GuiComponent, that component will be erased on a per-player basis. If persistent, the host inventory will be modified along with the target's view, thus affecting all new GUIs derived from this one.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot to embed an item into.
      item - The item to be embedded.
      persistent - Whether or not to modify the host inventory.

    • updateAllComponent

      public void updateAllComponent(int slot, GuiComponent component)
      Embeds a GuiComponent with a defined action into all GUI viewer's views of this GUI type.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot in which to embed a component into.
      component - The component to be embedded.

    • updateSingleDataItem

      public void updateSingleDataItem(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity e, Map<Integer,org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> data, boolean persistent)
      Embeds a map of slots and items, with no defined actions, into a GUI viewer's view. For each slot, if the slot being embedded into previously contained a GuiComponent, that component will be erased. If persistent, the host inventory will be modified along with the target's view, thus affecting all new GUIs derived from this one.
      Parameters:
      e - The target GUI viewer.
      data - A map of slots and items to embed.
      persistent - Whether or not to modify the host inventory.

    • updateSingleDataComponent

      public void updateSingleDataComponent(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity e, Map<Integer,GuiComponent> data)
      Embeds a map of slots and components with defined actions, into a GUI viewer's view.
      Parameters:
      e - The target GUI viewer.
      data -

    • updateAllDataItem

      public void updateAllDataItem(Map<Integer,org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> data, boolean persistent)
      Embeds a map of slots and items, with no defined actions, into all currently opened surface2 GUIs of this type. For each slot, if the slot being embedded into previously contained a GuiComponent, that component will be erased. If persistent, the host inventory will be modified along with the target's view, thus affecting all new GUIs derived from this one.
      Parameters:
      data -
      persistent -

    • updateAllDataComponent

      public void updateAllDataComponent(Map<Integer,GuiComponent> data)
      Embeds a map of slots and components with defined actions, into all currently opened surface2 GUIs of this type.
      Parameters:
      data -

    • surfaceView

      protected org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryView surfaceView(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity e)
      Obtains the InventoryView in use by a player in a Surface2 GUI. Returns null if the player is not in a Surface2 GUI.
      Parameters:
      e - The human target.
      Returns:
      The InventoryView in use by the target.

      public org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryView display(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity target, boolean init)
      Opens an inventory to the player, returning a handle to the inventoryview.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      A handle to the opened inventory view.
